item.title: Nail Your Cover Letter Opening 🎯 • Use: “I'm excited to apply for X at Y.” • Mention a specific company value or goal. • Highlight a relevant achievement. • Tie your skills directly to the role. • End with enthusiasm for the position. What specific achievement can you highlight to grab attention immediately? #coverletter #jobsearch #CareerForward #CareerFocused #CareerForge
